titles.title: Pharmaceutical Stewardship Act of 2016
To direct the Attorney General to establish a national pharmaceutical stewardship program to facilitate the collection and disposal of prescription medications.
Pharmaceutical Stewardship Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Pharmaceutical Stewardship Act of 2016
This bill requires the Drug Enforcement Administration to establish and implement a national pharmaceutical stewardship program to collect and dispose of prescription medications.
